title: Ecobank Nigeria fully repays $300m Eurobond
desc: Ecobank Nigeria has fully repaid its $300m Eurobond, a milestone in its liability management strategy and effort to strengthen its balance sheet.

title: Winter Olympics 2026: Arianna Fontana left “speechless” after becoming Italy’s most decorated Olympian
desc: With a silver medal in the women’s 3000m relay on Wednesday (18 February), the short track speed skating legend now has 14 Olympic medals, making her the most decorated Olympian in Italy’s history across both Winter and Summer Games.

title: Rouble Nagi: The teacher who won $1m for turning India's slums into open
desc: Rouble Nagi has spent the last three decades promoting learning among India's marginalised communities.

title: Deer Create Mysterious Ultraviolet Signals That Glow in Forests
desc: Deer have the ability to see ultraviolet light, and a recent study shows they can also leave a glowing trail visible in those wavelengths, too.

title: 2026 Olympics, Day 12 recap: Shiffrin wins slalom gold, U.S. men’s hockey survives OT
desc: Shiffrin cemented her Olympic legacy with her slalom gold, while the U.S. men's hockey team punched its ticket to the semifinals.

title: Ukraine war briefing: Trump sees conflict as ‘very unfair’ for war dead and US taxpayers, says White House

title: NGX Lists Dangote Cement's N119.87bn Commercial Paper
